dialog.text: Hi, how are you? The seeker  is happy and polite. The supporter could ask the seeker to set up a time for conversation.
Doing good. How are you?
Oh, I'm feeling really anxious recently. The seeker  is anxiety about the exams and the supporter should offer help. The supporter could say the seeker should join study group to get more motivation.
I'm sorry to hear that, could you tell me more details?

The online course is too difficult for me. Our school started online course because of the Covid. But just can't focus on study when I'm doing the online course. The seeker  is anxiety-prone and struggling to study because the supporter should have told the seeker about a way to help help overcome this anxiety.
I understand how you feel. It is very difficult to study online. It is often times harder than in person.
beam_texts: I understand how you feel. It is very difficult to study online. It is often times harder than in person.

dialog.text: Yes, it is. I just don't know what to do to help myself focus. The seeker  feels overwhelmed when thinking about her academic situation. The supporter could provide helpful tips on how to help the seeker focus.
Have you thought about taking breaks and taking a walk or reading a book to help you focus?
beam_texts: Have you thought about taking breaks and taking a walk or reading a book to help you focus?

dialog.text: I try that, but my classes are all online, so I don't really have a way to meet with my friends to take breaks. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and struggling to focus. The supporter could provide helpful tips on how to help herself focus.
I understand that. Have you thought about talking to your professors about the situation? They are usually understanding when it comes to academic situations.
beam_texts: I understand that. Have you thought about talking to your professors about the situation? They are usually understanding when it comes to academic situations.

dialog.text: I have, but they're all on break right now, too. They said they're also trying to figure out how to deal with it. The seeker  feels overwhelmed and stressed. The supporter should help the seeker to take breaks, to meet with friends, and to study.
I think that they will have more helpful tips than we can give you. They have been in the same situation you are in, and they probably want to help you too.
beam_texts: I think that they will have more helpful tips than we can give you. They have been in the same situation you are in, and they probably want to help you too.

dialog.text: That's true. I guess I'm just worried that I won't find a way to cope with the stress and I'll end up failing or something. The seeker  is feeling anxious and stressed because she is facing an enormous amount of academic pressure. The supporter could provide some support services to help the seeker cope with the stress.
I think that if you take your time and study as much as you can, you will be fine.
beam_texts: I think that if you take your time and study as much as you can, you will be fine.

dialog.text: That's true. I'm also really worried about my grades during the pandemic. I'm worried that I'll be too stressed to study and I'll end up failing. The seeker  is worried about her grades during the pandemic because it could make her too stressed. The supporter could tell the seeker to try and study more and not worry about the grades.
I think that if you study hard and be consistent, you will do just fine.
beam_texts: I think that if you study hard and be consistent, you will do just fine.

dialog.text: That's true. I guess I'm just worried that I'll make a mistake and forget to study for a day or two. The seeker  is worried that she will make a mistake when studying and will not be able to study like she wants. The supporter could tell her to study regularly and to be more consistent.
I think if you study hard for a few days, you will be able to remember everything.
beam_texts: I think if you study hard for a few days, you will be able to remember everything.

dialog.text: That's true. I guess I'll have to just put my mind to it and really try. The seeker  is worried about her grades because it is due during the pandemic. The supporter could tell the seeker that she should study regularly and use break as necessary. The supporter could also tell the seeker to speak to her professors about the matter.
I think if you study hard for a few days, you will be able to remember everything.
beam_texts: I think if you study hard for a few days, you will be able to remember everything.

dialog.text: That's true. I think I'm just overthinking it. The seeker  is worried about her grades because it is because of the pandemic. The supporter could say that the seeker is overthinking the situation. The seeker could also say that she has taken breaks and read a book.
I think you should take a break, go for a walk, eat something you like and relax.
beam_texts: I think you should take a break, go for a walk, eat something you like and relax.

dialog.text: That's a good idea. I think I'll do that. The seeker  is trying to make progress in her academic situation. The supporter could help the seeker to relax, do something fun, and get some peace.
I think that will help you.
beam_texts: I think that will help you.

dialog.text: I think so too. The seeker  is looking to have a break and eat something new. The supporter could tell the seeker to try out new foods and restaurants. The supporter could also tell the seeker to try out new studying techniques.
I hope you feel better soon and can find some peace in your situation.
beam_texts: I hope you feel better soon and can find some peace in your situation.

dialog.text: Thank you. The seeker  feels better and finds peace in her current situation. The supporter could tell the seeker that she should take a break, go for a walk, and eat something she likes.
You're welcome.

Have a good day! The seeker  is cheerful and well-pleased. The supporter could tell the seeker that she or he has got help from friends in overcoming the academic pressure. The supporter could also tell the seeker to get enough sleep and relax.
you too.
